features: 【Speed DPI Switch】 Bengoo customizable RGB gaming mice, with 4 adjustable DPI speed Switch:1200-1600-2400-3600, you can control the speed more freely and easily. No need any driver, plug and play directly.

【Flexible Buttons】 Equipped with six buttons: Left button, Right button, Forward, Back, DPI button and Scroll wheel, meets for your demands excellently for different games, enables to switch fast while gaming.
【Lighting Colors】 Muti-colors lights greatly match your style, provide you fancy gaming environment and highlight your game atmosphere.

【Ergonomic Design】 Perfectly fits under your palm, skin-friendly material we take provides you a perfect hand feel, gives gamers the most comfortable gaming experienece and makes you feel free from fatigue.
【Wide Compatibility】 Support Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8. Adaptable for Notebook, PC, laptop, Computer, Macbook and so on.

How do we get it to change colors? When you plug it on, it starts out a randomly chosen color, then soon after it changes colors. Can the light of the mouse be turned off? The light of mouse will light up when it is plugged in. If you want to turn it off, please pull it out from the USB port. What is the length of the mouse wire? About 150cm (4.9ft) Does it need any drivers? Just Plug and Play. NO additional software or firmware is required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can be inconvenient at times.
reviews.reviewText: Amazing and gorgeous mouse for a good price. It's been serving me well, holding up well, and is overall a great purchase.My only issues are1) i cannot control the flashing? I can turn it off, but I can't place it on one specific color. Not a huge deal, but it'd be cool if I could do that.2) The side buttons are extremely sensitive and easy to press onto. This is mostly ok in gaming - hell , preferred even, but in casual page viewing, it often reloads pages, back tabs, or closes tabs altogether WAY to easily.Love the logo, love the feel of it. My complaints are minor and brief, honestly, so 5 stars for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For my very first mouse it's great, it has all the features that I need and works Smoothly. My biggest wants is being comfortable with holding the mouse and the efficiency of the mouse which it does. I have hardly any experience with gaming on a computer and so I think this is a great starter mouse. If your looking for a quality one that is cheap, this is it. I have no complaints! Best of all the lights are so pretty! I would recommend buying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mouse works well and gets attention from people with changing colors. Price is good this is my second one. I bought one for work because I like it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the color changing aspect. This mouse has side buttons which help with gaming. No complaints good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny hands take time to adjust
reviews.reviewText: Got this so I could stop stealing my boyfriend's gaming mouse for my graphic design and gaming stuff. It is slightly bigger than the one he had so I had to adjust to its size as I have tiny hands. Otherwise, I absolutely love it. It's an amazing mouse for the price and it so pretty with how it lights up. Plus it is pretty sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Wired Mouse for Precision and Comfort!
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to this wired mouse, and it has exceeded my expectations. If you're in search of a reliable, non-wireless mouse that delivers precision and comfort, look no further.First and foremost, the ergonomic design of this mouse is a game-changer. It fits comfortably in my hand, ensuring extended use without any discomfort or strain. The textured surface provides a solid grip, making it effortless to control and navigate.The precision of this mouse is exceptional. The adjustable DPI settings allow me to fine-tune the cursor's sensitivity, which is perfect for tasks that demand precision and accuracy. Whether I'm working on detailed design projects or navigating through documents, it's up to the challenge.The wired connection ensures a stable and lag-free experience. No more worries about battery life or wireless interference. It's a plug-and-play solution, providing instant and reliable connectivity to my computer.The customizable buttons are a great feature, allowing me to program shortcuts and macros to streamline my tasks. It's versatile and adaptable for both work and gaming, making it a well-rounded choice.One minor drawback might be the absence of wireless convenience for some users, but if you prefer a wired connection, this mouse more than compensates with its reliability.In conclusion, this wired mouse has become an essential part of my daily setup. It offers a fantastic combination of precision and comfort, making it suitable for a range of tasks. If you're in the market for a wired mouse that enhances your computing experience, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's a top-notch choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's pretty much as described! I will say that you'll have to make sure to remove the film at the bottom of the mouse because it can be a little hard to miss! It lights up pretty well, and it's overall a decent size too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It lights up very pretty colors, which matches my computer that lights up random colors too. It was very pretty and great for gaming.

The media could not be loaded. A while ago my mouse was being really troublesome. I needed something fast, so I ordered this one with next day shipping for something like $15. I really didn't expect it to be anywhere near the quality of my old mouse at all, how could I? It's like $15, not the 90 that my Logitech optical one was... yeah this thing blew me away. It feels like quality. It's a fairly ergonomic design, has a braided cord, and glides smoothly. I needed to get a mouse pad for myself because the surface I was using it on didn't agree with it, which happens, but I think I will grab a couple more soon just as backups, just in case

Je voulais une souris type gamer (pour le design ) et je suis plutôt content pour le prix. Je ne m'en sers pas pour jouer donc je ne sais pas ce qu'elle vaut pour le jeu. Mais elle fonctionne bien pour une utilisation classique.
Es un ratón muy bonito, que funciona genial. Llevo más de un mes usándolo y me encanta. Desde luego lo volvería a comprar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great for my son to help with his schooling, the lights are amazing- great quality too
